name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 28, Li Yang, the founder of "Crazy English", said at the Global Chinese Studies Festival: English is the egg laid by Chinese, and the United States will sooner or later become an inseparable part of China.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A netizen on Xiaohongshu posted that he left the country in Pudong, Shanghai on September 28, but was restricted from leaving the country just because his "place of residence is Fuzhou, Fujian".
This netizen has good conditions, works in an Internet company in Shanghai, has not stopped paying social security for five years and holds a residence permit. This year, he has been to Japan, South Korea, Hong Kong, Thailand, Russia and other countries, and holds a multi-year multiple visa for Japan and South Korea.
Because this netizen was stopped by the border inspection, he faced the risk of losing his air tickets and hotels, and was also asked by the police in his place of residence to "go back on a working day to deal with it."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 30, the media reported that a food store owner in Tianjin added rat poison to food because he was dissatisfied with being ridiculed by fellow villagers for being unmarried at an old age, resulting in food poisoning for one person.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 30, A-shares ushered in an "epic" surge.
As of the close, the Shanghai Composite Index rose 8.06%, the Shenzhen Component Index rose 10.67%, and the ChiNext Index rose 15.36%. The turnover of the three markets of Shanghai, Shenzhen and Beijing was 2611.5 billion yuan.
This is also the first time in nine years that the turnover of A-shares has exceeded 2 trillion yuan again. It took only 35 minutes for the turnover of the Shanghai and Shenzhen markets to exceed 1 trillion yuan, setting a new record for the fastest trillion yuan in history.
Recently, the A-share market has risen from below 2,700 points to above 3,300 points in just a few trading days. From the recent low point to now (i.e. September 18 to September 30), the Shanghai Composite Index has risen by 23.39%, the Shenzhen Component Index has risen by 31.89%, and the ChiNext Index has risen by 41.68%.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 29 (report) In Loudi, Hunan, an eight-year-old boy forcibly carried a five-year-old boy over the railing and pushed him into a pool. Fortunately, his head did not hit the ground and the water in the pool was not deep. The video poster said that the boy's parents had a bad attitude afterwards, claiming that there were two lawyers in the family who could easily file a lawsuit.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 29, Chengdu, Sichuan. A strong wind blew in Chengdu that day, and a street lamp pole with a national flag hanging near Jinfu Road broke and fell, hitting an electric bike passing by. When medical staff and traffic police arrived at the scene, they immediately covered the injured with cloth.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, government accounts across the country have been forwarding a cartoon titled "Be careful in what you say and do, and stick to the red line of party discipline." The cartoon requires party members and cadres not to make irresponsible comments or inquire about national policies, and not to spread political rumors that undermine the party's unity.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some bloggers created emoticons to summarize the changes in the government’s attitude towards private enterprises.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
September 30, Heze, Shandong. Villagers were looking for harvesters to harvest corn, and dozens of elderly people were scrambling to break corn beside the harvesters, regardless of safety. The video shooter: More than a dozen people couldn't drive them away.
The original video has been deleted by the platform.
